dependsOn.activity: Export EquipmentInventory Data From Dataverse to Blob

activities.name: Copy EquipmentInventory Data From ADX To Staging Blob
Export EquipmentInventory Data From Dataverse to Blob

dependsOn.activity: Copy EquipmentInventory Data From ADX To Staging Blob

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ForceFullRefresh as boolean (false())
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['equipmentinventorycsp']) ~> StagingBlobEquipmentInventoryCSP
source(output(
		queueid as string,
		systemuserid as string,
		internalemailaddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['systemuser/user.parquet']) ~> userdatafromblob
source(output(
		teamid as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['team/*.parquet']) ~> teamdatafromblob

		maersk_area as string,
		maersk_countrycode as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	),

	validateSchema: false,

		statecode as integer,
		statuscode as integer,

		importsequencenumber as integer,

	),

source(output(

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',

		maersk_scvcode as string,
		accountid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['account/*.parquet']) ~> accountdatafromblob
source(output(
		createdby as string,
		createdbyname as string,
		createdbyyominame as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		createdonbehalfbyname as string,
		createdonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		exchangerate as decimal(38,18),
		importsequencenumber as integer,
		maersk_actfor as string,
		maersk_actloc_short as string,
		maersk_agenormal as integer,
		maersk_allowedforsale as boolean,
		maersk_area as string,
		maersk_areaname as string,
		maersk_billofladingnumber as string,
		maersk_bookingreference as string,
		maersk_cherrypickingfee as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_cherrypickingfee_base as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_client as string,
		maersk_clientname as string,
		maersk_clientyominame as string,
		maersk_containerid as string,
		maersk_current_loc_dsc as string,
		maersk_currentcountry as string,
		maersk_currentcountryname as string,
		maersk_currentpool as string,
		maersk_currentpoolname as string,
		maersk_currentsite as string,
		maersk_currentsitename as string,
		maersk_damagecode as integer,
		maersk_damageprediction as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_datahash as string,
		maersk_discharge_port_to_display as boolean,
		maersk_dischargecountry as string,
		maersk_dischargecountryname as string,
		maersk_dischargesite as string,
		maersk_emrunitcosts as double,
		maersk_eqioflt as string,
		maersk_equipmentreefertype as string,
		maersk_evacuationcostperbox as double,
		maersk_gatebuygateindone as boolean,
		maersk_hqminprice as integer,
		maersk_ignorebreakevenprice as boolean,
		maersk_infleetyear as string,
		maersk_inventorytype as integer,
		maersk_isempty as boolean,
		maersk_ispassthrough as boolean,
		maersk_keytoprice as string,
		maersk_keytoproduct as string,
		maersk_keytoproductname as string,
		maersk_last_move_from_fast_track as integer,
		maersk_leasingcompany as string,
		maersk_leasingcontract as string,
		maersk_load_port_to_display as boolean,
		maersk_loadcountry as string,
		maersk_loadcountryname as string,
		maersk_loadsite as string,
		maersk_longstandingdays as string,
		maersk_machinerytype as string,
		maersk_mercmode as string,
		maersk_minsalesprice as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_minsalesprice_base as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_move as integer,
		maersk_move_timestamp_gate_buy as timestamp,
		maersk_movetimestamp as timestamp,
		maersk_mrlbox as integer,
		maersk_mrlunit as integer,
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_oldcategory as string,
		maersk_oldcategoryname as string,
		maersk_operatorcode as integer,
		maersk_pretripinspectionstatus as integer,
		maersk_previousmove as integer,
		maersk_pricecategoryfromprice as string,
		maersk_pricetocompare as integer,
		maersk_productindex as string,
		maersk_productindexname as string,
		maersk_productsubtype as string,
		maersk_reasoning as string,
		maersk_region as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerdry as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerdryname as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerdryyominame as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerminprice as integer,
		maersk_regionalmanagerreefer as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerreefername as string,
		maersk_regionalmanagerreeferyominame as string,
		maersk_regionname as string,
		maersk_releasefreetime as integer,
		maersk_repaircountry as string,
		maersk_repaircountryname as string,
		maersk_repairestimate as double,
		maersk_repairlocation as string,
		maersk_repairlocationname as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerdry as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerdryname as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerdryyominame as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerminprice as integer,
		maersk_salesmanagerreefer as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerreefername as string,
		maersk_salesmanagerreeferyominame as string,
		maersk_salesmovedate as timestamp,
		maersk_salesprice as integer,
		maersk_size as integer,
		maersk_team as string,
		maersk_teamname as string,
		maersk_teamyominame as string,
		maersk_yearofmake as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedbyname as string,
		modifiedbyyominame as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyname as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		overriddencreatedon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		owneridname as string,
		owneridtype as string,
		owneridyominame as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owningteam as string,
		owninguser as string,
		statecode as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as integer,
		transactioncurrencyid as string,
		transactioncurrencyidname as string,
		utcconversiontimezonecode as integer,
		versionnumber as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['equipmentinventorycsp']) ~> dataversedata
source(output(
		maersk_areacode as string,
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_areaid as string,
		maersk_region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['area/*.parquet']) ~> areadatafromblob
StagingBlobEquipmentInventoryCSP derive(eqpno = trim(toString(byName('eqpno'))),
		repair_location_id = trim(toString(byName('repair_location_id'))),
		move_timestamp = toTimestamp(byName('move_timestamp')),
		move = case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-IN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-OUT',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='DISCHARG',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='LOAD',379430003,
                case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='ON-RAIL',379430004,
                    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='OFF-RAIL',379430005,
                        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='STRIPPIN',379430006))))))),
		previous_move = case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-IN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-OUT',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='DISCHARG',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='LOAD',379430003,
                case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='ON-RAIL',379430004,
                    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='OFF-RAIL',379430005,
                        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='STRIPPIN',379430006))))))),
		actfor = trim(toString(byName('actfor'))),
		stempty = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('stempty'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		subtype = trim(toString(byName('subtype'))),
		country_cd = trim(toString(byName('country_cd'))),
		current_site = trim(toString(byName('current_site'))),
		stselscr = trim(toString(byName('stselscr'))),
		operator_code = case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='SAL',379430000,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='SEA',379430001,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='TTL',379430002,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='ALI',379430003,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='ANL',379430004,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='APL',379430005,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='CMA',379430006,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='DAL',379430007,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='EMC',379430008,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='HAN',379430009,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='HAS',379430010,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='HLO',379430011,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='HMM',379430012,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='HSU',379430013,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='MCC',379430014,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='MLL',379430015,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='MSC',379430016,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='COS',379430017,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='MSK',379430018,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='NDL',379430019,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='ONE',379430020,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='PDL',379430021,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='PIL',379430022,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='POL',379430023,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='SCL',379430024,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='SGL',379430025,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='UAF',379430026,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='XCL',379430027,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='YML',379430028,
case(trim(toString(byName('operator_code')))=='ZIM',379430029)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))),
		damage_code = case(toInteger(byName('damage_code'))==1,379430000,
    case(toInteger(byName('damage_code'))==2,379430001,
        case(toInteger(byName('damage_code'))==3,379430002,
         case(toInteger(byName('damage_code'))==4,379430003)))),
		bill_of_lading_number = trim(toString(byName('bill_of_lading_number'))),
		booking_reference = trim(toString(byName('booking_reference'))),
		longstanding_days = trim(toString(byName('longstanding_days'))),
		actloc_short = trim(toString(byName('actloc_short'))),
		pre_trip_inspection_status = case(trim(toString(byName('pre_trip_inspection_status')))=='GREEN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('pre_trip_inspection_status')))=='RED',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('pre_trip_inspection_status')))=='Release to Booking (BLUE)',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('pre_trip_inspection_status')))=='Assigned to Booking (UNKNOWN)',379430003)))),
		year_of_make = trim(toString(byName('year_of_make'))),
		infleet_year = toTimestamp(byName('infleet_year')),
		machinery_type = trim(toString(byName('machinery_type'))),
		leasing_contract = trim(toString(byName('leasing_contract'))),
		leasing_company = trim(toString(byName('leasing_company'))),
		release_free_time = toInteger(byName('release_free_time')),
		allowed_for_sale = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('allowed_for_sale'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		merc_mode = trim(toString(byName('merc_mode'))),
		equipment_id = trim(toString(byName('equipment_id'))),
		repair_estimate = toDouble(byName('repair_estimate')),
		eqioflt = trim(toString(byName('eqioflt'))),
		equipment_reefer_type = trim(toString(byName('equipment_reefer_type'))),
		regional_manager_dry = trim(toString(byName('regional_manager_dry'))),
		regional_manager_reefer = trim(toString(byName('regional_manager_reefer'))),
		sales_manager_dry = trim(toString(byName('sales_manager_dry'))),
		sales_manager_reefer = trim(toString(byName('sales_manager_reefer'))),
		country = trim(toString(byName('country'))),
		current_pool = trim(toString(byName('current_pool'))),
		current_loc_dsc = trim(toString(byName('current_loc_dsc'))),
		team = trim(toString(byName('team'))),
		age_normal = toInteger(byName('age_normal')),
		product_group = trim(toString(byName('product_group'))),
		category = trim(toString(byName('category'))),
		old_category = trim(toString(byName('old_category'))),
		is_pass_through = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('is_pass_through'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		product_index = trim(toString(byName('product_index'))),
		price_category = trim(toString(byName('price_category'))),
		level_3_size = case(toInteger(byName('level_3_size'))==20,379430000,
    case(toInteger(byName('level_3_size'))==40,379430001,
        case(toInteger(byName('level_3_size'))==45,379430002))),
		level_3_product_type = trim(toString(byName('level_3_product_type'))),
		ignore_breakeven = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('ignore_breakeven'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		Evacuation_cost_per_box = toDouble(byName('Evacuation_cost_per_box')),
		emr_unit_cost = toDouble(byName('emr_unit_cost')),
		current_site_type = trim(toString(byName('current_site_type'))),
		break_even_price = toInteger(byName('break_even_price')),
		cherry_picking_fee = toInteger(byName('cherry_picking_fee')),
		move_timestamp_gate_buy = toTimestamp(byName('move_timestamp_gate_buy')),
		gate_buy_scv_code = trim(toString(byName('gate_buy_scv_code'))),
		inventory_type = case(trim(toString(byName('inventory_type')))=='Normal',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('inventory_type')))=='Gate-Buy',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('inventory_type')))=='Pick-Up',379430002,0))),
		gate_buy_gate_in_done = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('gate_buy_gate_in_done'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		sales_move_date = toTimestamp(byName('sales_move_date')),
		repair_country_id = trim(toString(byName('repair_country_id'))),
		discharge_site = trim(toString(byName('discharge_site'))),
		discharge_country = trim(toString(byName('discharge_country'))),
		discharge_port_to_display = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('discharge_port_to_display'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		load_port = trim(toString(byName('load_port'))),
		load_country = trim(toString(byName('load_country'))),
		load_port_to_display = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('load_port_to_display'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		last_move_from_fast_track = case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='GATE-IN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='GATE-OUT',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='DISCHARG',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='LOAD',379430003,
                case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='ON-RAIL',379430004,
                    case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='OFF-RAIL',379430005,
                        case(trim(toString(byName('last_move_from_fast_track')))=='STRIPPIN',379430006))))))),
		key_to_product = trim(toString(byName('key_to_product'))),
		key_to_price = trim(toString(byName('key_to_price'))),
		price_category_from_price = trim(toString(byName('price_category_from_price'))),
		sales_price = toInteger(byName('sales_price')),
		price_to_compare = toInteger(byName('price_to_compare')),
		sales_manager_minimum_price = toInteger(byName('sales_manager_minimum_price')),
		regional_manager_minimum_price = toInteger(byName('regional_manager_minimum_price')),
		headquarter_minimum_price = toInteger(byName('headquarter_minimum_price'))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation, userdatafromblob lookup(sales_manager_dry == internalemailaddress,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesManagerDryColumn
LookupSalesManagerDryColumn select(mapColumn(
		eqpno,
		repair_location_id,
		move_timestamp,
		move,
		previous_move,
		actfor,
		stempty,
		subtype,
		country_cd,
		current_site,
		stselscr,
		operator_code,
		damage_code,
		bill_of_lading_number,
		booking_reference,
		longstanding_days,
		actloc_short,
		pre_trip_inspection_status,
		year_of_make,
		infleet_year,
		machinery_type,
		leasing_contract,
		leasing_company,
		release_free_time,
		allowed_for_sale,
		merc_mode,
		equipment_id,
		repair_estimate,
		eqioflt,
		equipment_reefer_type,
		regional_manager_dry,
		regional_manager_reefer,
		sales_manager_reefer,
		country,
		current_pool,
		current_loc_dsc,
		team,
		age_normal,
		product_group,
		category,
		old_category,
		is_pass_through,
		product_index,
		price_category,
		level_3_size,
		level_3_product_type,
		ignore_breakeven,
		Evacuation_cost_per_box,
		emr_unit_cost,
		current_site_type,
		break_even_price,
		cherry_picking_fee,
		move_timestamp_gate_buy,
		gate_buy_scv_code,
		inventory_type,
		gate_buy_gate_in_done,
		sales_move_date,
		repair_country_id,
		discharge_site,
		discharge_country,
		discharge_port_to_display,
		load_port,
		load_country,
		load_port_to_display,
		last_move_from_fast_track,
		key_to_product,
		key_to_price,
		price_category_from_price,
		sales_price,
		price_to_compare,
		sales_manager_minimum_price,
		regional_manager_minimum_price,
		headquarter_minimum_price,
		sales_manager_dry_id = systemuserid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesManagerDry
SelectSalesManagerDry, userdatafromblob lookup(sales_manager_reefer == internalemailaddress,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesManagerReefer
LookupSalesManagerReefer select(mapColumn(
		eqpno,
		repair_location_id,
		move_timestamp,
		move,
		previous_move,
		actfor,
		stempty,
		subtype,
		country_cd,
		current_site,
		stselscr,
		operator_code,
		damage_code,
		bill_of_lading_number,
		booking_reference,
		longstanding_days,
		actloc_short,
		pre_trip_inspection_status,
		year_of_make,
		infleet_year,
		machinery_type,
		leasing_contract,
		leasing_company,
		release_free_time,
		allowed_for_sale,
		merc_mode,
		equipment_id,
		repair_estimate,
		eqioflt,
		equipment_reefer_type,
		regional_manager_dry,
		regional_manager_reefer,
		country,
		current_pool,
		current_loc_dsc,
		team,
		age_normal,
		product_group,
		category,
		old_category,
		is_pass_through,
		product_index,
		price_category,
		level_3_size,
		level_3_product_type,
		ignore_breakeven,
		Evacuation_cost_per_box,
		emr_unit_cost,
		current_site_type,
		break_even_price,
		cherry_picking_fee,
		move_timestamp_gate_buy,
		gate_buy_scv_code,
		inventory_type,
		gate_buy_gate_in_done,
		sales_move_date,
		repair_country_id,
		discharge_site,
		discharge_country,
		discharge_port_to_display,
		load_port,
		load_country,
		load_port_to_display,
		last_move_from_fast_track,
		key_to_product,
		key_to_price,
		price_category_from_price,
		sales_price,
		price_to_compare,
		sales_manager_minimum_price,
		regional_manager_minimum_price,
		headquarter_minimum_price,
		sales_manager_dry = sales_manager_dry_id,
		sales_manager_reefer_id = systemuserid
	),
